topics.body:
So I'm watching Episode 15 of Attack on Titan, and I have probably come across the most crazy character this show has to offer.

And her name is Zoe Hange.
!http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130602133055/shingekinokyojin/images/9/96/Hange_Zo%C3%AB_in_anime.png!
Don't look her look and calm expression fool you.
THAT WOMAN IS SERIOUSLY CRAZY.
AND THAT HAS TO SAY SOMETHING CONSIDERING THIS IS ATTACK ON TITAN WE'RE TALKING ABOUT.

But listen to me. She's not _that_ insane, or some sort of deranged lunatic. She's actually pretty amusing with her quirky antics, a talented fighter, and just really fascinated with Titans and their behavior...perhaps too interested for her own safety...
And now she's got her attention on Eren [spoiler]and his strange Titan abilities[/spoiler].

This show is something I tell you. One moment people are dying left and right, and they you got this crazy Titan scientist-chick making creepy faces at poor Eren, like this one for example:
!http://img1.ak.crunchyroll.com/i/spire1/834c052028798a31a56c5bd4e0d0c9081378061804_full.png!
~Yeah, Eren will totally cooperate with you, giving him a face like that~
~Calm down you wierdo, and don't spook the poor child~

Then again, I've just met this chick, and I cannot comprehend her full personality and behavior right now. I don't even think these picture alone can capture her true likeness or true nature in the show. She's someone you've got to meet or witness to understand who she is or how she works.

And I'm starting to think she's becoming one of my favorite characters on the show, just like that.
(but why the heck does she looks really similar to Sasha?)
